head.title: COVID-19 Update - Anderson School District Two

meta.content: Anderson School District Two is striving to stay up to date with information regarding the Coronavirus. As a district, we will continue to keep everyone informed of best practices to help prevent the spread of respiratory viruses like Coronavirus and flu.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p: Welcome to Anderson School District Two's website. To learn more about our district, check out our Mission / Vision page. Curious where your one cent sales tax goes? Take a look at Your Penny at Work, where we are always adding new projects we've been able to complete thanks to your penny.
This is where staff can find all of their relevant information.
Welcome Parents! We are excited about our new webpage. If you cannot find the information you are looking for, please give us a call. We will be happy to assist.

nav.div: Anderson School District Two » News » What's New » COVID-19 Update

img.span: Anderson School District Two is striving to stay up to date with information regarding the Coronavirus. As a district, we will continue to keep everyone informed of best practices to help prevent the spread of respiratory viruses like Coronavirus and flu.

br.span: Please be informed that the Governor of South Carolina is closing all schools effective immediately. Anderson Two schools will begin eLearning Tuesday, March 17th through May 22nd. Additional information will be provided in the days that follow. Please continue to follow us on our social media channels.

br.br:
The following ASD2 events have been canceled or postponed:
-All field trips/school events for the remainder of the school year
-4K screening postponed until a later date
